title: New: Lists – Autumn
body:
_‘it will be autumn soon / so let’s just try to see the summer through’_

Hailing from Edinburgh, **Lists** (Ali Milesi) has just taken his first strides with the release of his debut track, _Autumn_.

With a voice that could melt butter, it’s one of the most assured and dazzling compositions of 2014 thus far. Airing insecurities, regrets and worries, all underpinned by Milesi’s gorgeous, Scottish tones, it’s a hugely promising debut.

With a voice that could melt butter, it’s one of the most assured and dazzling compositions of 2014 thus far. \[…\]
